# META {

# META       ]
# META     }
# META   }
# META }

# CELL ********************

# Set case sensitive
spark.conf.set("spark.sql.caseSensitive", True)

# Drop the Sales Table
spark.sql("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Sales")

# Recreate the Sales Table
spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE Sales (
    Date DATE,
    StoreID LONG,
    TransactionID LONG,
    TransactionType STRING,
    TimeInt LONG,
    ProductID LONG,
    UnitPrice DECIMAL,
    Qty LONG,
    Amount DECIMAL
)
"""
)

# METADATA ********************

# META {
# META   "language": "python",
# META   "language_group": "synapse_pyspark"
# META }
